mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_alarm_image (id, alarm_id, image_name, image_url, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.alarmId}, #{item.imageName}, #{item.imageUrl}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime})
